Name: Hero's everyday life
About the game: In Hero's everyday life, you need to play the role of a hero, completing a variety of tasks from give and bring, to kill monsters and bosses. Help all the different game characters with their mundane tasks and become famous throughout the fantasy kingdom as a great hero! Or just fool around and have as much fun as you can! The world is filled with various secrets, there are also enemies who are ready to break you no matter what, so arm yourself with a sword and hit the road. Who is a hero? Is this the one who gets up in the morning for an adventure? Or the one who fights for the good and prosperity? In general, you will need to decide which of you will be the hero and for what you will fight! The kingdom of fantasy is filled with monsters, NPS cannot fulfill their mission and therefore they called you a hero, and whether you are a great hero or not, it's up to you to decide! Complete a mission, fight monsters, kill bosses, or just insult the king and retire!
